casebody.data:
JONES
v.
CITY OF DURHAM. No. 137A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 17, 2006. Stewart W. Fisher, Carlos E. Mahoney, William S. Mills, Durham, for Linda Jones. Mark A. Davis, Raleigh, for County Commissioners, et al. Bradley N. Schultz, T. Marie Mobley, Smithfield, for Academy of Trial Lawyers.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of April 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (City of Durham, et al.) shall have up to and including the 8th day of May 2006 to file and serve *834his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of April 2006."
